about.title: Leading Smart Manufacturing
about.description1: Founded in 2020, Haifei AI is a high-tech enterprise focused on intelligent manufacturing. Through more than a decade of continuous innovation and development, we have become an industry-leading intelligent manufacturing solution provider.
about.description2: We are committed to providing global manufacturing enterprises with advanced automation equipment, high-precision detection systems, industrial vision systems, and human-machine interaction systems. From consumer electronics to automotive industry to smart factories, our solutions have been successfully applied in multiple industry fields.

items.title: Haifei AI Wins 2025 Best Innovation Enterprise Award
items.description: At the 15th China Manufacturing Conference, Haifei AI received the Best Innovation Enterprise Award for its innovative achievements in the field of intelligent manufacturing.

items.title: Industry 4.0 Era: How AI Empowers Manufacturing
items.description: In the rapidly changing manufacturing industry, artificial intelligence is becoming a key factor for enterprises to improve competitiveness. This article explores the application of AI in manufacturing.
